Mini 1587: Mutiny!


The salty sea air. The cool breeze rushing across your face. The spray of water as the boat lurches to and fro. This is the life of a pirate.
"Yarrr!!!!!!" A piraty cry breaks the calm. As you rush to investigate, you find Corporal, your Captain, dead, a cutlass buried in his back. There is a bottle of rum in his hand with a note inside. Someone cracks open the bottle and reads it out.

"Arr, me hearties. Thar be mutineers aboard."

Corporal, Captain, killed N0.

The whole ship is in an uproar. People are running port and starboard. It's up to you to find out who did this dastardly deed, and make them pay.

Rules:
Adapted from the ruleset of Twistedspoon.
If you have any questions, feel free to PM me or ask in-thread for clarification.

1. General Stuff
a) Mafia is a game. Have a bit of fun!
b) Personal attacks are a no no. Attack the post, not the poster. If I see someone insulting someone out of hand, it may result in a modkill. You have been warned.
c) Don't forget, while you are having fun, that you are expected to play to the best of your ability, and to your wincon.
d) I am human, I CAN make mistakes (especially seeing as it's my first time modding ). If I do make a mistake, please tell me.
e) Please bold notes intended for me.
f) Don't post here unless you're on the player list (obviously).
g) I reserve the right to change or update any rules.
h) I will be using Natural Action Resolution to determine action results at night.
i) Any of the roles specified as Normal on the Wiki may be used in the game. In addition, there may be one other role that does not appear on that page. This role will still use normal mechanics.

2. Communication
a) Don't talk about this game anywhere else other than in this thread, unless you've been specifically told to by me. Modkilling may apply to those who don't follow these instructions.
b) Do not quote your role PM or any moderator related communications. Paraphrasing is acceptable, but don't push it.
c) If you die, you are allowed one "bah" post with no game related content.
d) If you die, you will be given access to a private thread with other dead pirates.
e) No cryptography or anything that I can't (or anyone else for that matter) read.
f) Don't edit or delete posts.
g) Mod posts will be in purple. Please don't use this colour.
h) Flavour does not contribute anything important to the game, other than making it cooler.

3. Voting
a) Votes must be in bold or with the [/vote] tags, at the start of a line.
Vote: Captain Corporal is good.
VOTE: Captain Corporal is also good.
b) You may unvote the same way, except using [/unvote] tags in place of the [/vote] tags, but this is not required, unless you wish to remove your vote entirely.
c) Do not abuse voting to intentionally confuse other players.
d) Abbreviations are fine as long as it's easy to see who you're referring to.
e) A lynch (or no-lynch) occurs when a majority is reached. For an odd number of players, this is (n+1)/2. For an even number of players, this is (n/2)+1.
f) Posting is allowed in twilight (the time between the hammer and when I kill them).
g) Once someone has been hammered, voting and unvoting will do nothing, the lynch will still proceed.
h) If no majority is reached by the deadline, a no-lynch will occur.
i) When someone is replaced, votes by that person are automatically taken off.
j) Fake hammers or encrypted votes are illegal.

4. Deadlines and Activity
a) Day 1 will be 3 weeks. All subsequent days will have deadlines of 2 weeks.
b) Night 1 will have a deadline of 72 hours and all subsequent nights will have a deadline of 48 hours.
c) You may request a deadline extension, it will require at least half of the majority of living players (minimum 2 players) to agree. Each extension will be no longer than 72 hours.
d) Depending on replacements and such, I may extend the deadline.
e) If posting is minimal, I may shorten the deadline.
f) Actions posted after the night deadline will not be counted, and you will automatically do nothing.
g) Please try and post regularly (at LEAST every 48 hours). If you don't post within 72 hours, you will be prodded. If you don't respond to the prod through in-game contact, or PM if the thread is locked, you will be replaced.
h) If you get prodded three times, or twice in the same game day, you will be replaced.
i) Post all V/LAs in-thread or PM them to me. I will show each V/LA in the votecount.


Sample role PM:

You're a Vanilla Townie. You have no special abilities, other than your voice and your vote.
You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town-aligned player is alive.

Role PMs going out now. Game will start when 10/13 players have confirmed their roles.

Moving on, we can't have people trying to call their cap'n over only for two of us to respond so to make things clear, I shall be known henceforth as Captain Slandaar and Salamence shall be known henceforth as First-Mate Salamence this should help with any confusion which may arise.

Lost a leg and bleeding to death? have a drink! Not that I know about doctoring, I don't, but I am sure our doctor is a fraud if you go onto his operating table you don't come back. Poor Boonakins had no chance of survival what with his head being caved in by a cannon ball... aint no drink gonna cure that I tell ye.

Sorry about the super long wait, I'm currently running a camp, so I don't have too much time on my hands. I should have let you guys known. I'll be home around the time night ends.

It was the end of another hard day at sea. The crew was weary and exhausted from the trials that the sea put forward, and wanted blood. There had already been disputed among the crew as to who was to be captain in place of the late Corporal. After a very short discussion, Catastrophe was pushed from the mob of angry pirates towards the plank. "We don't want your kind here!" bellowed one of the crew. Another shouted, "Yarr, we'd best sink ye to the bottom of the ocean. Never trust a hydra! It was you who killed our beloved captain!!"
